title: Prepare Response to Payer Formulary Request
description: A health economics and outcomes research (HEOR) specialist must prepare a dossier for a payer (insurance company) that is considering adding a new drug to its formulary.

tasks.description: Assemble the core value dossier for the product, including all clinical efficacy and safety data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all the relevant clinical study reports.

tasks.description: Incorporate economic models showing the cost-effectiveness of the drug compared to competitors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent embeds the approved economic models and their outputs into the dossier.

tasks.description: Tailor the dossier to the specific payer's format and requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reformats the dossier to match the payer's template (e.g., AMCP format).

tasks.description: Submit the final dossier to the payer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the dossier via the payer's portal.
